name: Surf Rock
description: Short instrumental songs with Rock & Roll rhythms overlaid with cheerful melodies played on reverb-drenched tremolo guitar.

children.name: Eleki
children.description: Japanese Surf Rock that emerged during the early to mid-1960s, incorporating elements of Japanese Folk Music.

children.name: Rautalanka
children.description: Nordic guitar style mainly influenced by Rock & Roll, and traditional European Schlager.

children.name: Wong shadow
children.description: Small, short-lived guitar Pop movement in Thailand in the 1960s, fusing Surf Rock  with local melodies.
